mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS id, password, name, birth, gender, email, phone, address, identity, img_src AS profileImage FROM member JOIN attachment USING (member_id) WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND category_id = 'AtchId04'
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO MEMBER VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{identity}) INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (#{profileImage}, #{id}, 'AtchId04') SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attachment WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND category_id = 'AtchId04'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachment (img_src, member_id, category_id) VALUES (#{image}, #{memberId}, 'AtchId04')
